docs.lead_paragraph: DISCARD your system based upon revenge." That is the advice which Thomas Mott Osborne gives to the State of New York for application to its penitentiaries, as a result of the six days spent by him last Fall as a voluntary "convict" in Auburn Prison.

headline.main: DENOUNCES NEW YORK'S PENAL SYSTEM OF "REVENCE"; Thomas Mott Osborne, in Book of His Experiences as Voluntary "Convict" at Auburn, Says Existing Conditions in Our Penitentiaries Are "Organized Lunacy" and "the Foulest Blot Upon Our Social System."

docs.snippet: DISCARD your system based upon revenge." That is the advice which Thomas Mott Osborne gives to the State of New York for application to its penitentiaries, as a result of the six days spent by him last Fall as a voluntary "convict" in Auburn Prison.
